sentence: Paul Casey, 44, is likely to have another Ryder Cup in him, while the likes of Matt Fitzpatrick, Thomas Pieters, Tommy Fleetwood and Shane Lowry have already played in the biennial showpiece.
author: Pa Sport Staff
title: Key questions following Henrik Stenson’s Ryder Cup captaincy appointment
